bill_title: increase the statutorily authorized maximum payment or indemnity for governmental officers and employees.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to increase the statutorily authorized maximum payment or indemnity for governmental officers and employees. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 3-19-2 be amended to read as follows: 3-19-2. In no event may the total amount of payment or indemnity for any one officer or employee exceed the sum of twenty-five fifty thousand dollars. Indemnity in excess of twenty-five fifty thousand dollars may be presented as a claim to the Legislature. 300 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.029 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
